channel.title: Easy Client Creation : Version 1
channel.description:
Decided to make a Client Creation source Including tutorials how to change thing ect.
Base : Webber's Client (New) Added : a few new models and stuff
Download : http://uppit.com/v/X1XX3FBJ
[b]What is Easy Client Creation?[/b] Easy Client Creation is a Project i have been working on for about 2-3 Days now. The whole time i was fixing the client basically
it has 4 tutorials
[b]Features :[/b]
How to change the Title How to compile How to make it run your Ip Adding models Client that hold all costumes Nearly (Edited Webbers (NEW) Lol)
I Created this so people wouldnt moan as much on "Help" Section about how to change things Also i am Creating a lot of projexts like this
Easy Server Maker allready done and this Working on a application of "Easy Server Maker" Right now that you can just click on it.
soon there will be 474/503/508 and 525 (When im use to 525 i will do 525)
Download :D

item.title: Easy Client Creation : Version 1
item.dc:creator: @I_PK_Pigeons I PK Pigeons
item.description:
@I_PK_Pigeons wrote:

1st

You need to get a model
Moparscape & Silab have good ones

Mopsrscape.org/smf
Silabsoft.org/smf

Download it
Go to class8

Add ints Beside rest Middle/End or begning

Thats it your done

Extra :
The Model has to be added to your
Server Source

Have you even looked at Webbers Client?
It’s renamed, it doesn’t have Class8, its itemDef

If you’re going to release shit like this, at least look at the fucking files…

Read full topic

item.title: Easy Client Creation : Version 1
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

I have now downloaded this heap of junk. Dont waste time getting this. All the package includes is a 317 client (which is oviously not his) and then 4 basic tuts. If your going to make something like this at least provide some sort of program, even a command line based program!

[code]1st

You need to get a model
Moparscape & Silab have good ones

Mopsrscape.org/smf
Silabsoft.org/smf

Download it
Go to class8

Add ints Beside rest Middle/End or begning

Thats it your done

Extra :
The Model has to be added to your
Server Source[/code]

[code]Firtly you need to go to…

Client.Java

Type Ctrl+F
And search YourIp

Change it to your server ip address

Save and compile[/code]

[code]Ok First Go to Client.java (Client)
Search
YourClient’s Title

Change “Yourclient’s Title”
To your server name

it could also be YourClient

Save and Compile[/code]

[code]First you need a JDK

http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
Copy&Paste tht into your browser.

do not click
JDK 6 Update 13 with Java EE
Or anything like that

Just
JDK 6 Update 13

Click the orange button beside it!

Download&Install it.

Next on your click
Right click Compile

change :

@echo off
COLOR 0b
cls
title Webber’s Client - Compiler
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

To :

@echo off
COLOR 0b
cls
title Webber’s Client - Compiler
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Then run “Compile”[/code]

@Psycotix, Thats the whole point of this program!

Read full topic
